test_pygraph.py¶

This module contains the tests to the class PyGraph in module PyGraph.

This test serves to ensure the viability of the methods of the class PyGraph in PyGraph.py.

class test_pygraph.TestPyGraph[source]¶

This class contain the test methods if the class PyGraph.
